sentences.sContent: She swore she saw him putting the helicopter down in a cornfield.
sentences.sCn: 她肯定地说她看到他把那架直升飞机降落到了玉米地里。

sentences.sContent: The helicopter is staying over our heads.
sentences.sCn: 那架直升机就在我们头顶的上方。

trans.tranOther: a type of aircraft with large metal blades on top which turn around very quickly to make it fly
